name: DUAL CANNONS
description:
An asteroids like game where you gain experience, progress waves, level abilities, and break scores!

This game is in current development and will likely see lots of changes as it grows.

Current Version: 0.07
Discord: https://discord.gg/4MM6Dt7
fair warning... the discord has only me as of writing this

Controls
move: wsad or arrow keys
fire: spacebar
